GU University

Established in 1948, Gauhati University is one of the premier institutions of higher education in Northeast India and one of the most sought-after postgraduate institutions. In its long history, Gauhati University has served as a think tank for the advancement of Assamese society. Some of the courses—such as Radiological Physics—are among the few and the only ones of their kind in the whole Northeast. The course has a 100% placement rate as of right now.

The university serves as a symbol of the intellectual and cultural foundation of the area, upon which the other academic institutions of Northeast India were founded. 210+ subjects and courses are available. The teacher-to-student ratio right now is almost 1:16.

Brief Ranking & Rewards

Also approved by the Bar Council of India.

PES is also approved by the Bar Council of India. (BCI)

Gauhati University Admission

The application process is to be done online. Admission to post-graduate programs will be based on the offline entrance test. The admission test will be held in July 2022 in different centers of Northeast India.

For more details visit the Admission

Gauhati University Placement

The major goal of the placement cell at Gauhati University is to foster leadership qualities in students and the development of human excellence. The university's placement cell collaborates with top companies in the public and private sectors to make it easier for students to find jobs. All students who have registered with the Placement Cell will receive placement aid, career counseling tailored to specific jobs, and inspirational support.

For more details visit the Placement
